Chmod modes Converter¶

This is a small chmod modes converter, to convert from octal/ numeric modes to symbolic and vice versa. The converter is written in Javascript and its source code can be found under chmod-converter.js


Permissions:

Owner Group Other
Read
Write
Execute
chmod modes converter and interpreter
